name: Price List
query:
select pl.item_code as 'Item::200', pl.item_name as 'Name::300', pl.currency as 'Currency::70', pl.price_list_rate as 'Price::100'
from `tabItem Price` pl
left join `tabItem` i on i.name=pl.item_code
where i.item_group=%(item_group)s and pl.selling=1 and pl.price_list=%(price_list)s and pl.currency=%(currency)s
